text:
I am usig DailyRollingFileAppender in my application. There are two seperate 
processes that write to the log file. One of the processes correctly writes to 
new file after rollover at midnight.But the second process overwrites 
yesterday's file. This process also runs at midnight to refresh itself.
I would like to know if someone has already solved this problem or if this is 
unreported.
creator: parul.miglani@exel.com

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 17201 ***
creator: ceki@apache.org
